snippet.textDisplay: wow!! i never heard this game before... holy cow.. now i must know and play the game myself!!!
snippet.textOriginal: wow!! i never heard this game before... holy cow.. now i must know and play the game myself!!!

snippet.textDisplay: Need more songs from this game or Gust in general on your list. They are so underrated it's criminal.
snippet.textOriginal: Need more songs from this game or Gust in general on your list. They are so underrated it's criminal.

snippet.textDisplay: So good! I've always loved vocals like these,the voice can be refined to be such a great instrument!
snippet.textOriginal: So good! I've always loved vocals like these,the voice can be refined to be such a great instrument!

snippet.textDisplay: Never knew the series had a prequel. Must play it.
snippet.textOriginal: Never knew the series had a prequel. Must play it.

snippet.textDisplay: This piece suits an endgame world map, where you've beaten everything before you and now just have one final challenge lying in front of you.
snippet.textOriginal: This piece suits an endgame world map, where you've beaten everything before you and now just have one final challenge lying in front of you.

snippet.textDisplay: i like it. reminds me of Nier's music.
snippet.textOriginal: i like it. reminds me of Nier's music.

snippet.textDisplay:
I have finished Ar Tonelico I and II and currently playing III all because of the OST: I found the music to be so beautiful, so fantastic, so magical that I decided I had to play it and let me tell ya, a brand new copy of the first Ar Tonelico is not cheap but it was worth it, so worth it.
I honestly can't wait for this one, I can only hope it's translated to english but even if it isn't, I must play it.
snippet.textOriginal:
I have finished Ar Tonelico I and II and currently playing III all because of the OST: I found the music to be so beautiful, so fantastic, so magical that I decided I had to play it and let me tell ya, a brand new copy of the first Ar Tonelico is not cheap but it was worth it, so worth it.
I honestly can't wait for this one, I can only hope it's translated to english but even if it isn't, I must play it.

snippet.textDisplay: haven't heard of game before but instantly recognized it being related to the Ar Tonelico series.  Good to see their still making games and now can hope they'll localize this game someday *crosses fingers*
snippet.textOriginal: haven't heard of game before but instantly recognized it being related to the Ar Tonelico series.  Good to see their still making games and now can hope they'll localize this game someday *crosses fingers*

snippet.textDisplay: My immediate thought on what genre the game is after searching it's name in Google Images: Bikini Dress-Up Simulator.
snippet.textOriginal: My immediate thought on what genre the game is after searching it's name in Google Images: Bikini Dress-Up Simulator.

snippet.textDisplay: What the fuck I shouldn't have google that at work. Now I look like a huge perv. :-\
snippet.textOriginal: What the fuck I shouldn't have google that at work. Now I look like a huge perv. :-\

snippet.textDisplay: I wouldn't call this music just solid, but that's me. I think it's incredible both this and Ar Tonelico.
snippet.textOriginal: I wouldn't call this music just solid, but that's me. I think it's incredible both this and Ar Tonelico.

snippet.textDisplay: This is a prequel to Ar tonelico, it came out recently in Japan but I'm not sure this one will make it here since the series is very niche. It always has solid music though, the Gust sound team really developed its own recognizable style. I have no idea if this game is actually any good though.
snippet.textOriginal: This is a prequel to Ar tonelico, it came out recently in Japan but I'm not sure this one will make it here since the series is very niche. It always has solid music though, the Gust sound team really developed its own recognizable style. I have no idea if this game is actually any good though.

snippet.textDisplay: Just finished all 5 games. And holy shit the music level in these is insane. Nothing comes even close. 1,2,3 and 5 are in english. 4th will never be released with english translation, but there is fan project on youtube that lets you experience the story of the game in english. Playing Ar Nosurge without knowing what happened in Ciel no surge is just silly stupid.
snippet.textOriginal: Just finished all 5 games. And holy shit the music level in these is insane. Nothing comes even close. 1,2,3 and 5 are in english. 4th will never be released with english translation, but there is fan project on youtube that lets you experience the story of the game in english. Playing Ar Nosurge without knowing what happened in Ciel no surge is just silly stupid.

snippet.textDisplay: It had it's own uniqueness in terms of the maiden system, but other than that it was like any other rpg. Still fun.
snippet.textOriginal: It had it's own uniqueness in terms of the maiden system, but other than that it was like any other rpg. Still fun.

snippet.textDisplay: I doubt it will come here to North America.  Although, this series does have some really good music.  Achiwa is actually a pretty underrated composer.  I like the works he has done.  I'll have to listen to more soundtracks from this series.
snippet.textOriginal: I doubt it will come here to North America.  Although, this series does have some really good music.  Achiwa is actually a pretty underrated composer.  I like the works he has done.  I'll have to listen to more soundtracks from this series.
